hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/zsh
# Make sure this directory's there, without failing: mkdir $WORKSPACE/all 2> /dev/null || true
# Remove the existing jpeg from the last build: rm $WORKSPACE/*.jpeg || true # And remove any broken links to removed builds: find -L $WORKSPACE/all/ -type l | xargs rm -fv
# Capture the image with the current time: ~/src/ckoenig/bin/wacaw --VGA snapshot # Add a caption with the timestamp: convert snapshot.jpeg -draw "text 10,20 '`date +\"%c\"`'" snapshot.jpeg # And link to the new jpeg, in its to-be-archived location: ln -sf ~/.hudson/jobs/webcam/builds/$BUILD_ID/archive/snapshot.jpeg $WORKSPACE/all/$BUILD_ID.jpg
